creature-code.md.title: CreatureCode
creature-code.md.name: creature-code.md
creature-code.md.content:
-- Python Educational Game with QR Code Implementation: --
- Built a Slay the Spire + Pokemon style rougelike battle game where players can learn Class and OOP concepts in Python. 
- Uses Vue.js for the frontend and Express.js for the backend. 
- Implements QR Codes for Monster Creation and Raid Boss Lobbies. 
- Implements WebSockets for the battle lobbies, allowing for multiplayer collaboration. 
- Uses Gemini AI to create Python quizzes for players to answer.

frauditor.md.title: Frauditor
frauditor.md.name: frauditor.md
frauditor.md.content:
-- Fraud Review Detection System (FutureHack 2025 Top 10 Finalist): --
- Built a Google plugin using JavaScript that detects the legitimacy of Shopee reviews live.
- Uses a self-trained Python model, hosted on Render, for prediction.
- My involvement included scraping and classifying reviews, creating the Python backend API, and developing the plugin logic.

crowd-control.md.title: Crowd Control Prediction
crowd-control.md.name: crowd-control.md
crowd-control.md.content:
-- Crowd Control Prediction: --
- A web application built with Next.js and FastAPI that predicts crowd count and flow to provide actionable insights for event organizers.
- Achieved up to 95% confidence level in predicting crowd count.
- Deployment used AWS services (Amplify, EC3).
- The AI model was trained using AWS SageMaker AI, with data preprocessed by AWS Glue.

pom.md.title: Purchasing Order Management System
pom.md.name: pom.md
pom.md.content:
-- Purchasing Order Management System (POMS): --
- Built a Java GUI application to manage the procurement process.
- Developed a QueryBuilder API for text files to simplify data querying.
- Created a Routing API (like ReactRouter) to simplify page routing for teammates.
- These APIs significantly quickened the team's development process

community-service.md.title: Community Service Web Application
community-service.md.name: community-service.md
community-service.md.content:
-- Community Service Web Application: --
- Webpage built with HTML/CSS/JavaScript (frontend) and PHP/MySQL (backend).
- Supports several user types and includes built-in validation and accuracy checks
